site_name: Site At Thurlow Park Road And Croxted RoadLondonSouthwark
description: Tree works TPO Tl. A Lime - Side entrance of Croxted Road. Recommended works: Remove deadwood  Remove epicormic growth  Re-adjust metal signage straps by 2cm. Reason: To abate harm, hazard and nuisance. T10- T13. A Silver Birch -To side and front of 129-133 Thurlow Park Road. Recommended Works:  Remove deadwood Reason: To abate hazard. T15. Holly- Front of 129-133 Thurlow Park Road. Recommended works:  Remove deadwood.  Lift 2.5m above footway. Reason: To abate hazard. T16. Yew. Front of 129-133 Thurlow Park Road. Recommended works:  Remove dead Bush box at base overhanging footpath.  Crown lift 2.2m above entrance path and footway. Reason: To abate hazard and nuisance. T17. Crabapple. Front of 135-139 Thurlow Park Road: Recommended works:  Crown lift 2.2m above entrance path. Lateral crown reduction to provide 2m clearance from property. Reason: To abate hazard. T18. Cherry. Front of 135-139 Thurlow Park Road: Recommended works:  Crown lift 2.2m above entrance path.  Lateral crown reduction to provide 2m clearance from property. Reason: To abate hazard. T20. Crabapple. Front of 135-139 Thurlow Park Road: Recommended works:  Remove deadwood. Reason: To abate hazard. T21. Holly. Front of 135-139 Thurlow Park Road: Recommended works:  Remove deadwood.  Crown lift 2.Sm above footway. Reason: To abate hazard. T22. Yew. Front of 135-139 Thurlow Park Road: Recommended works:  Crown lift 2.5m above footway. Reason: To abate hazard 29
decision_conditions: Time Limit for Works to TPOs
